node.text:
Explorer/Activist Johan Ernst Nilson. Nilson has climbed the Seven Summits (and many other peaks), visited 178 countries and some of the most remote places on Earth, and he is in the Guinness Book of World Records for his Three Poles Challenge Expedition. His travels and experiences have allowed him to see climate change and its consequences first hand, and now Nilson is an activist for change, leading people on expeditions, giving talks, and making films about the environment.

node.text:
The Astronomia Everest project started with renowned Swedish explorer and environmental activist @johanernst taking an Astronomia Tourbillon with him on an expedition to the Himalayas.
"I wore the regular Astronomia Tourbillon on my last climb to the Himalayas, where I went up to 6,200 meters (almost 20,000 feet), in -30 C degree, extreme conditions," Nilson says. "You would think that such a complicated watch would be delicate and fragile, but it isn't, and it performed perfectly in all conditions. I used it climbing up ice walls, with my ice ax, banging it against rock and ice and it held up extremely well.”

Explorer/Activist Johan Ernst Nilson. Nilson has climbed the Seven Summits (and many other peaks), visited 178 countries and some of the most remote places on Earth, and he is in the Guinness Book of World Records for his Three Poles Challenge Expedition. His travels and experiences have allowed him to see climate change and its consequences first hand, and now Nilson is an activist for change, leading people on expeditions, giving talks, and making films about the environment.

node.text:
Push the right-hand crown of the incredible BUGATTI Chiron Tourbillon and the engine comes to life – the crankshaft turns and the 16 pistons pump up and down, just like BUGATTI’S iconic W16 engine. Two “turbochargers” on the side of the engine block spin while the engine runs, adding to the visual impact.
Incredible to see and unbelievably complicated to realize (the movement is comprised of 578 components), the BUGATTI Chiron Tourbillon timepiece seamlessly marries engines and watches – something no other watchmaker has done before.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #hautehorlogerie #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible #bugatti #bugattichiron

node.text:
An Offer You Can’t Refuse. Look to the grand piano and see the notorious Vito Corleone as the newest addition to the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater. The Swiss Music Box combined with a triple-axis tourbillon, a minute repeater, and the Godfather himself might just be the offer you can’t refuse.⠀
⠀
Jacob & Co. has the exclusive rights, in partnership with Paramount Pictures, to use The Godfather logo, and the haunting melody in the amazing Opera Godfather Minute Repeater timepiece.
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #hautehorlogerie #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible #godfather

node.text:
An Incredible Icon. Now with the face of Marlon Brando, the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater uses two hammers to strike exposed circular gongs to sound out the hours, the quarters of hours, and the minutes. In the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater, the gongs circle above the dial, visible through the large sapphire crystal and rose gold case. This voluminous case enhances the clarity, tone, and richness of the sound of the gongs.
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #hautehorlogerie #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible #godfather

node.text:
The Astronomia Everest project started with renowned Swedish explorer and environmental activist @johanernst taking an Astronomia Tourbillon with him on an expedition to the Himalayas.
"I wore the regular Astronomia Tourbillon on my last climb to the Himalayas, where I went up to 6,200 meters (almost 20,000 feet), in -30 C degree, extreme conditions," Nilson says. "You would think that such a complicated watch would be delicate and fragile, but it isn't, and it performed perfectly in all conditions. I used it climbing up ice walls, with my ice ax, banging it against rock and ice and it held up extremely well.”

Explorer/Activist Johan Ernst Nilson. Nilson has climbed the Seven Summits (and many other peaks), visited 178 countries and some of the most remote places on Earth, and he is in the Guinness Book of World Records for his Three Poles Challenge Expedition. His travels and experiences have allowed him to see climate change and its consequences first hand, and now Nilson is an activist for change, leading people on expeditions, giving talks, and making films about the environment.

node.text:
An Incredible Icon. Now with the face of Marlon Brando, the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater uses two hammers to strike exposed circular gongs to sound out the hours, the quarters of hours, and the minutes. In the Opera Godfather Minute Repeater, the gongs circle above the dial, visible through the large sapphire crystal and rose gold case. This voluminous case enhances the clarity, tone, and richness of the sound of the gongs.

node.text:
In the world of watchmaking, the presence of a tourbillon in a watch’s movement places the piece among the elite. @JacobandCo’s Twin Turbo Furious 300+ sets itself apart from this rarified group, incorporating two accelerated triple axis tourbillons into its striking design. The tourbillons work to compensate for the effects of gravity on the precision of the movement.⠀ ⠀
⠀
Even the case of the Twin Turbo Furious Bugatti 300+ is super complicated – made of forged carbon, with a titanium core to ensure water resistance - the case alone is comprised of 88 parts. The grand complication movement is made up of 832 individual parts – incredible to consider that many parts coming together, and amazing to see in action.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
The Phoenix, according to the Ancient Greeks, is a creature that is born again, rising from the ashes of the conflagration of its former self. A powerful symbol, the Phoenix is the focus of the latest Astronomia Art piece from Jacob & Co. Born from this maelstrom, the Phoenix in the Astronomia Art Phoenix is spreading its wings and protecting the double-axis tourbillon movement.

node.text:
The Opera Godfather Minute Repeater adds yet another Grand Complication to the Jacob & Co. collection. Combining the Swiss Music Box with a triple-axis tourbillon and a minute repeater could just be an offer you can’t refuse.⠀
⠀
Jacob & Co. has the exclusive rights, in partnership with Paramount Pictures, to use The Godfather logo, and the haunting melody in the amazing Opera Godfather Minute Repeater timepiece.
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
The Jacob & Co. Brilliant Full Baguette Icy Blue Sapphires has a total of 348 baguette and one cabochon icy blue sapphires totaling more than 23 carats. It took upwards of four months to source the gems in complementary hues and then took a gem setter another six weeks to mount them onto the dial and case. This gem-induced brilliance extends to the winding crown and buckle for the white satin strap.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
The Jacob & Co. Brilliant Full Baguette Icy Blue Sapphires watch is a bejeweled beauty with an exceptional power source: the JCAA04 Swiss movement. It powers the white gold leaf hands that glide across a dial paved with 152 baguette icy blue sapphires, contributing to the 348 baguette and one cabochon cut icy blue sapphires totaling more than 23 carats that covers this timepiece.

.⠀

node.text:
“Ladies of London” alum, Caroline Stanbury, looks quite comfortable wearing the Brilliant Full Baguette Icy Blue Sapphires timepiece. The 38mm white gold case, dial and crown are covered with 348 baguette and one cabochon icy blue sapphires totaling more than 23 carats creating a cool casual look for the popular stylist and socialite.

node.text:
💎 New Launch 💎 

The Bugatti Chiron Tourbillon Rose Gold takes its distinctive 55mm-by-45mm tonneau shaped case and covered it with baguette diamonds and sapphires. Sapphire crystal provides a clear view of the 578 hand-decorated and hand-assembled components of the exclusive JCAM37 manual wound caliber. Other details of the movement include the power reserve universal gas pump symbol on the side of the gauge at nine o'clock and blue sapphire hour markers.

node.text:
💎 Introducing 💎 

The Bugatti Chiron Baguette Rose Gold features more than 17.80 carats of baguette-shaped diamonds and blue sapphires that cover the bezel, inner rings, hour markers, sides, and crowns of this high-performance watch. In addition to the fully working replica of the Bugatti “W16” engine, there’s a 30 degree inclined 60-second flying tourbillon visible through a replica of the horseshoe-shaped Bugatti grille. The watch is driven by the JCAM37 manual movement with a 60-hour power reserve.

node.text:
💎 New Timepiece 💎 

The Bugatti Chiron Baguette Rose Gold takes the unique shape and functionality of the Chiron timepiece and adds 355 baguette diamonds and 72 baguette blue sapphires, all invisibly handset. Inside the 18K rose gold case is a fully working replica of the Bugatti “W16” engine clearly visible through sapphire crystal. Activated on demand, the “engine” comes to life with 16 pistons pumping and two turbochargers spinning.

node.text:
The Opera Godfather, created in partnership with Paramount Pictures, combines music and movement. With a push of a button at 10 o’clock, Two all-black cylinders with 36 teeth turn against two combs to play the first 120 notes of The Godfather theme music. At the same time a rose gold triple-axis tourbillon whirls; and the entire dial rotates 120 degrees in 30 seconds, carrying in the center, a hand-painted figurine of the Godfather. A violin winding crank replaces a standard crown to power all the complications.

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #godfather #hautehorlogerie #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by JACOB & CO. on August 12, 2021 tagging @jacobandco.

node.text:
The dial of the Opera Godfather contains a combination of exclusive complications and artistic details that together creates the essence of what is considered by many to be the greatest film series of all time. Among the items are a black lacquered piano, a rose gold triple-axis tourbillon, the film’s iconic logo on a black painted 18K rose gold plate, and a black time display subdial, offset by 18K rose gold appliques.

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#jacobandco #jacobandcowatches #godfather #hautehorlogerie #hautehorology #inspiredbytheimpossible

The 49mm black DLC grade 5 titanium case of the Opera Godfather presents the magnificent story of the Godfather trilogy that comfortably fits on the wrist. The dial provides a bold and balanced view of the complications, artistic details, and a glimpse of the mechanics in black and 18K rose gold. The watch is powered by the exclusive Jacob & Co. JCFM04 manual wound movement.

.

node.text:
The Astronomia Meteorite Triangle Diamonds presents the iconic Astronomia four-arm vertical movement with its four exclusive continuously moving complications on a stage that floats above a base of sparkling triangular-shaped diamonds and glittering gold. The performance can clearly be seen within the 50mm domed sapphire crystal and 18K rose gold case.

.⠀

node.text:
The gem-setting and jewelry making skills of Jacob & Co. are in clear view with the Astronomia Meteorite Triangle Diamonds. Highly skilled artisans were able to cut and polish 383 triangle-shaped diamonds totaling more than 16.50 carats that adorn the base, sides, and lugs of the 50mm case. The diamonds are placed within an openworked 18K rose gold layout that requires the skills of master jeweler. Together they transform the timepiece’s iconic four-arm vertical movement to a new dimension of astrological innovation and gem-set brilliance.

.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀

node.text:
The Astronomia Meteorite Triangle Diamonds timepiece combines the Astronomia with its celestial inspiration with Jacob & Co's unique gem-setting skills. It is a cinematic sculpture animated by its four-arm movement construction that rotates above its rose gold and diamond-bound base and within the 18K rose gold and sapphire case. A total of 383 triangle-cut white diamonds adorns the lugs, sides and base of the case. The 50mm case supports the exposed movement and diamond and gold brilliance while fitting comfortably on the wrist.

.⠀
.⠀
